name: Velvet Luxe Lipstick
description: Richly pigmented satin lipstick infused with nourishing argan oil for all-day comfort.

name: Aurora Glow Highlighter
description: Weightless illuminating powder that delivers a dewy, glass-skin radiance on every complexion.

name: Gardenia Mist Eau de Parfum
description: Floral-fruity fragrance layering gardenia petals, bergamot zest, and a hint of cedarwood.

name: Silk Veil Setting Spray
description: Hydrating setting mist with aloe and green tea that locks makeup for up to 16 hours.

name: Cloud Creme Moisturizer
description: Airy gel-cream moisturizer packed with hyaluronic acid for bouncy, supple skin.

name: Petal Soft Cleansing Balm
description: Melting balm-to-oil cleanser that dissolves long-wear makeup without stripping.

name: Midnight Renewal Serum
description: Retinol-alternative night serum with bakuchiol and peptides for smoother skin overnight.

name: Desert Bloom Blush
description: Silky mineral blush inspired by desert sunsets for a natural rosy flush.
